Description.Text: Kath and Roy Hamilton welcome you to The Patricia - an attractive Torquay Guest House centrally located in the heart of The English Riviera, South Devon. They are ideally situated within walking distance of Torquay seafront, town centre, marina and the Riviera Conference Centre, with many attractions also being within a short drive. The Patricia is a Victorian terraced guest house which has retained many of the original features. Their attractive, en-suite bedrooms have all of the facilities that you'd expect from a 4 star bed and breakfast and as resident proprietors, you can be assured of a warm welcome and attentive service that will leave you wanting to return again and again. The hotel also offers free breakfast.
